text: S. THIRUMALAI Contact: +91-94895 38055 ~ E-Mail: <EMAIL> SENIOR MANAGEMENT PROFESSIONAL Multi-faceted professional in quest of challenging assignments in Project Management/Construction Management/Site Management with an organization of high repute in Construction industry PROFILE SUMMARY A dynamic & result oriented professional Totally 25 years. With 17 years of gulf experience and 8 Years of India experience in : ~ Project Management ~ Construction Management ~ Site Managem ent ~ Resource Planning ~ Vendor Development ~ Material Management ~ Liaison & Coordination ~ Team Management Currently associated with ETA ASCON, DUBAI as Sr.Project Engineer Hand-on experience in conducting construction & maintenance of buildings, right from quality and progress monitoring, etc. Demonstrated excellence in: o Executing the entire project right from scratch to its completion o Ensuring compliance and respect for community and legal requirements A strategic planner with expertise in planning and executing construction projects with a flair for adopting modern construction methodologies; complying with quality standards Championed in operating civil engineering works with specialization in construction of highways, commercial buildings, residential buildings , etc. Successfully managed multiple projects and milestones while ensuring projects complied with all cost and scope specifications An effective communicator with good planning, coordination and analytical skills MAY 2014 to TILL ETA ASCON Construction in Dubai Sr.Project Engineer Jun 2010 to April 2014 Sonee infra Structure pvt.ltd ,Chennai ,India. Project in-charge Nov’2009 to May’2010 Oman Oryx Trading & Contracting Co. LLC, Muscat Construction Manager Mar’2004 to Nov’2008 ETA ASCON Construction in Dubai Project Engineer Apr’1995 to Aug’2003 Besix Construct Ltd., Dubai UAE Foreman Key Result Areas Developing project baselines; monitoring & controlling projects with respect to cost, resource deployment, time over-runs and quality compliance to ensure satisfactory execution of projects Formulating operating budgets and managing overall operations for executing civil projects within cost & time norms Interacting with vendors for achieving cost effective purchase of equipment, accessories, material with timely delivery so as to minimize the project cost Responsible for implementing QA / QC procedures, Total Quality Management principles; conducting audits to ensure adherence to quality and safety norms during project execution Supervising all construction activities including providing technical inputs for methodologies of construction & coordination with site management activities Anchoring on-site construction activities to ensure completion of project within the time & cost parameters and effective resource utilization to maximize the output Formulating & implementing stringent systems and quality plans / manuals to ensure high quality standards during all stages of project Leading a team of professionals; ensuring suitable deployment and timely availability of manpower (designers & engineers) Liaising with clients, architects, consultants, contractors, sub-contractors & external agencies for determining technical specifications, approvals and obtaining statutory clearances Highlights: Instrumentally handled the Conference Palace Hotel Project (7 Star Hotel) Essayed a stellar role in erection of Hollow Core Slabs of 16 m length in the Emirates New Engineering Centre – Dubai International Airport Project with 2000 Car Parking Facility in 2004 Acknowledged with certification of appreciation for the outstanding contribution & successful completion of the project within the deadlines for 2B+G+M+7 Fully Furnished Hotel Apartment for Star Metro Deira Dexterously handled & excited the construction of RCC buildings, multi-storied commercial and residential buildings, hallow core slab erection car park & residential Demonstrated excellence by supervising & monitoring Structural & Finishes works EDUCATION B.Tech.(Civil Engineering) Distance Education from Rajasthan Vidayapathy University in 2015 Diploma in Civil Engineering from Board of Technical Education, Tamilnadu India in 1993 PERSONAL DETAILS Date of Birth: 26th April, 1969 Address: Door No. 157/14, K.
